title: Submission of a suitable methodology for the specific determination and identification of National Heritage in Sri Lanka
decision_details: - Cabinet, having considered the issues arisen due to the absence of criteria or a mechanism for the specific identification of National Heritage in Sri Lanka, granted approval on 2021‑11‑16 to appoint a Committee comprising the experts/scholars in the relevant subject fields, to seek views of the public and formulate a mechanism for the identification of tangible and intangible national heritage which establishes the Sri Lankan cultural identity. The Committee has submitted its Report as per the said decision and it has been pointed out by the Report the necessity of establishing a central independent institutional structure for the proper management of the activities such as identification, documentation, declaration, curation, monitoring and acquisition of national heritage belonging to Sri Lankans and conducting researches thereon. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as the Minister of Buddhasasana, Religious & Cultural Affairs to pursue action as per the recommendations of the said Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
